name: Clean VR
description:
Or you could just let yourself loose and smash the piano with random objects.

Clean VR was created as a five week long school project by the game industry students of Ahlman Institute.FeaturesFree mode:
  • Play the piano
  • Try to get your toy plane to fly
  • Throw objects around

Timed mode:
  • Clean the room
Tools usedProgrammers:
  • C#
  • Visual Studio
  • Unity
  • Google
Visual Artists:
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • Unity

General:
  • Audacity
  • Steam VRTK
Requirements
  • HTC Vive
  • VR Capable PC
